snippet: Exports for the whole of 2014 set a record high of $573.1 billion, underlining strengthening competitiveness for some of its companies.
abstract: South Korean exports grew 3.7 percent in December over year earlier; exports for 2014 set record high of $573.1 billion.
lead_paragraph: Exports for the whole of 2014 set a record high of $573.1 billion, underlining strengthening competitiveness for some of its companies.

headline.main: Growth in South Korea Exports Exceeded December Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Growth in South Korea Exports Exceeded December Forecasts
